summary:
### December 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/create-eth

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Updated the Staking challenge to Crowdfunding and added an Oracle challenge to the extensions list (#374).
  - Upgraded React to version 19.0.3 as part of a backmerge (#371).
  - Enhanced CI/CD processes by adding permissions for OIDC flow (#370).

- **Package Management:**
  - Version packages were updated automatically through the Changesets action (#372).
  - Added a changeset for previous updates to ensure proper versioning (#369).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing the functionality and maintainability of the project through updates and improvements.
  - Active management of dependencies and CI/CD configurations to align with the latest standards. 

No significant bug fixes were noted this month.

topPRs.title: change staking to crowdfunding, add oracle challenge
Update action to use latest node version
ci: add permisison to have oidc flow
